es.uvigo.esei.amchartsJava.core.parser

Class ParserJson

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uvigo.esei.amchartsJava.core.parser.ParserJson

  • public class ParserJson
extends java.lang.Object
    This class save and load config from app to temp folder in json format. This class support export to amcharts library but doesn't generate html, which is neccesary to be visualized in browser or in app.
    Author:
    Iago Fernández Cuñarro
